title: Fragment, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a woven foundation
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Panel of black figured velvet, cut and uncut, with a ground shot with silver in a symmetrical pattern of palmette and foliage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) in a woven foundation. 
Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-40
